article:
Births
* 436 BC ** Isocrates, Athenian orator (d. 338 BC) ** Artaxerxes II, king of
  Persia (approximate date) (d. 358 BC)
* 435 BC – Philoxenus of Cythera, Greek dithyrambic poet (d. 380 BC)
* 432 BC – Dionysius, tyrant of Syracuse (approximate date) (d. 367 BC)

Deaths
* 437 BC – Volumnius, Etruscan ruler (d. in Veii)
* 430 BC (approximate date) ** Empedocles, Greek philosopher (b. c. 490 BC) **
  Phidias, Greek sculptor (b. c. 480 BC) ** Zeno of Elea, Greek philosopher (b.
  c. 490 BC) ** Myron of Eleutherae, Boeotia, Greece, sculptor

References
